title: Code Geass: Boukoku no Akito
original_name: コードギアス 亡国のアキト
sinopse: The story takes place in Europe in the year a.t.b. 2017. A Knightmare unit made of boys and girls from Area Eleven are thrown into a military operation with a 5% chance of survival. They must rescue an allied unit left behind on the European warfront.
